body_text: nit: static variables can be followed by semicolons (e.g. static propTypes = { ... };). I only know/remember this because my IDE colors will be off if I don't use the semicolon.
body: nit: static variables can be followed by semicolons (e.g. `static propTypes = { ... };`). I only know/remember this because my IDE colors will be off if I don't use the semicolon.
